title: codehtcmail
author: codehtcmail
content: Hello everyone.I have made some mistakes that caused a financial disaster.I am not looking for charity, I am looking to work, I can do -Campaign management-Escrow service-Some simple graphic design (not gonna lie nothing spectacular) -Facebook+Instagram ads management (pretty decent in this did manage my own pages with success since 2016), also reply to messages and all.-Translation into and from English Arabic and French.-Let me know your needs, maybe I can provide, if not I will be honest and will not take anything I know I can't do properly.Promise to give 100% effort, 12 hour work days.My mistake harm my family who did nothing wrong and I have to take responsibility for my action so here I am looking for work here.PS: My country Tunisia is in a terrible economic crisis and on the brink of collapse, I tried looking for a job but nobody is hiring, tried selling some home made sweets but a shortage in flour and sugar in the country makes it almost impossible, in fact I was attacked and almost beaten because of it.Thanks to anyone who read this lengthy post, I sincerely hope nobody suffers what I suffer now.

comments.author: Eh Moo Nah
comments.body: best way to sell your service is to inlcude your samples or your Portfolio. show them your experiences and Design so they can rely on your skills and negotiate with the payment for your work.  also. you are Offering Escrow service - This service should not be included to your Niche since you are having Financial Problem. you are not trustworthy enough IMO.

comments.author: codehtcmail
comments.body: Quote from: Eh Moo Nah on June 14, 2023, 08:34:42 PMbest way to sell your service is to inlcude your samples or your Portfolio. show them your experiences and Design so they can rely on your skills and negotiate with the payment for your work.  also. you are Offering Escrow service - This service should not be included to your Niche since you are having Financial Problem. you are not trustworthy enough IMO.I think being honest from the beginning is important, escrow service is based on trust and reputation, as for a portfolio I am co designer of this websitehttp://tunisietech.store/We stopped at that point when we realised we can't implement a payment method, not us the creators, but our banking system in Tunisia is still from the 50's, one bank when I told them we want a plugin to process payments on our website thought we were trying to hack the bank and almost called security on us.Anyway, thanks for the advice.

comments.author: Porfirii
comments.body: Quote from: codehtcmail on June 14, 2023, 07:40:43 PMHello everyone.I have made some mistakes that caused a financial disaster.I am not looking for charity, I am looking to work, I can do-snip--Translation into and from English Arabic and French.-snip-My mistake harm my family who did nothing wrong and I have to take responsibility for my action so here I am looking for work here.-snip-I don't promise you anything, but it seems that you are having a really bad time, so we can do a little test in the Alliance of Bitcointalk Translators and, if our official Arabic or French translators can't handle any paid work we can give you a try.Paid works are still an exception because we just started our Alliance 3 months ago, and our main translators are usually available for works like these, but no matter how little the chance, I hope it adds up.

comments.author: NotATether
comments.body: Quote from: codehtcmail on June 15, 2023, 05:18:20 AMQuote from: Eh Moo Nah on June 14, 2023, 08:34:42 PMbest way to sell your service is to inlcude your samples or your Portfolio. show them your experiences and Design so they can rely on your skills and negotiate with the payment for your work.  also. you are Offering Escrow service - This service should not be included to your Niche since you are having Financial Problem. you are not trustworthy enough IMO.I think being honest from the beginning is important, escrow service is based on trust and reputation, as for a portfolio I am co designer of this websitehttp://tunisietech.store/We stopped at that point when we realised we can't implement a payment method, not us the creators, but our banking system in Tunisia is still from the 50's, one bank when I told them we want a plugin to process payments on our website thought we were trying to hack the bank and almost called security on us.Anyway, thanks for the advice. I think you can use one of Skrill, Neteller, Perfect Money, or Payoneer as your payment method, no? There are also some (anonymous) crypto payment processors like Blockonomics if fiat is not that important to you.Or if none of those are options for Tunisia, you can make an online account at The Kingdom Bank and pass KYC, then link any other payment method to that. (Note: US citizens are banned, pretty much everyone else is allowed though).

comments.author: pawel7777
comments.body: I'm sure you're aware of that, but you should keep an eye on the signature campaigns, I think some of them are currently open (if not, still worth monitoring as things change quickly):https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=615953.msg62387617#msg62387617It may be hard for you, given the lack of activity, but if you share your history in application post(s), who knows, maybe you'll get in (your green trust works in your favour).You won't survive on that alone, but that's still better than nothing and should not consume too much of your time.Good luck.

comments.author: GH2022
comments.body: Really sorry to hear of your bad fortune, OP.If you need help with a Payment Processor or help with getting Bitcoins, please DM me as I may be able to help you out.I know that certain North African countries almost exclusively ban Bitcoins, or at least make them illegal and hard to come by.
